website_summaries.verdict: One of the nicer pool ball sets available for online purchase, this popular product is sure to impress.
pros: Crafted from high-quality poly resin, perfect for leisurely playing
Customers appreciate the strength of their build
cons: A few customers claim each ball is a different weight

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Money !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these pool balls, so I would have some to use on our community table. I haven't played in a long time, and need a lot of practice. They are consistent in size and weight. The coloring is nice. The price is good. These play just fine - I see no reason to pay the higher prices. I would buy these again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: MimiTop Contributor: Jewelry Making

customer_reviews.title: Not Izsy Billiard Balls
customer_reviews.text: The balls I received were not the same art design as shown in the picture. The art design in the picture is the same as you would see sold on IzsyBilliards.com. The balls I received were plain Empire balls as noted on the packaging box. The balls are okay if you do not care about regulation weight, these balls weighed in at 6.5 to 6.7 ounces, although advertised as regulation weight. The Izsybilliard balls probably are at regulation weight, since my community complex has the same exact balls and design and weighed in at regulation weight. I was disappointed in the false advertising here and returned my balls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not proper weight.
customer_reviews.text: The numbered balls are a full 1 oz. heavier than they should be. Some may not care or notice especially at $22. The avid player probably will not approve. Cosmetically they look fine but I didn't unpack evry ball. I weighed three at 6.5 oz each. The cue should weigh that much but numbered balls should be 5.5. Amazon Prime returns are usually a breeze. I dont expect this return to be any different.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Cannizzaro

customer_reviews.title: No cue ball :(
customer_reviews.text: It would have been better if it would have came with the cue ball as it shows or describes. So I had to go to Walmart the day before Christmas eve to get one as this was part of a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmiekaye11

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I bought an old 1974 model 8 foot table. After getting up to my house I had a pro come and assemble refilled and level it. The balls that came with it we’re not in good shape so I wanted to get a set of balls to get started with but not break the bank. These are adequate for our skill level, but they do not roll as true as others I have seen. If you’re a good stick, and play a lot, I’d probably invest a bit more.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew N. Whiteford

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money — BUT...
customer_reviews.text: For the money??? I mean, seriously??? You cannot beat this. The balls are 100% capable. They look decent. You can hit them and hit them and hit them — and they hold up. Now look... while they’re fine as basic balls are concerned, they are not pro quality. They mark up easily. They are not very shiny. They are serviceable. But that’s it. If you want a great set of balls you will need to spend at least $160 on a a set of Aramith Premium. But if you don’t give a sh** then buy these, they will function.
customer_reviews.author: J. Loftus

customer_reviews.title: Nice set, compliments table, but not greatest quality.
customer_reviews.text: The set of pool balls arrived fast and looks great brand new. The cue ball is not made for "coin operated pool table", so it doesn't return where it should. I knew that from previous reviews though, so I don't see it as an unexpected problem. I played few games on two occasions using new set and I am disappointed to already see scratches on some balls. This product overall rated very high on "product rating sites" and I was expecting a lot more out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Just what the doctor ordered
customer_reviews.text: Low price but has worked swell for my table. I don't own a nice setup of marble and really expensive felt. I imagine if you have the money for that, you have money for the nicer balls... This set came just as I expected. I even used some weight tricks to figure out the exact center weight points. They are relatively perfectly balanced from what I've measured. For the price, no complaints here!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Empire. Not Izzy.
customer_reviews.text: Balls are decent, the 2 and 5 have some smudges on them that are in the cast and won’t come out. Balls are also different weights. Brand on amazon says Izzy, turns out they’re empire.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: The perfect set
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pool table balls. Very accurate. When done playing just wipe them off and put them back in the box to keep them dust free and looking new. Great gift idea for anyone with a pool table. Fast delivery. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Patti b

customer_reviews.title: extremely low quality
customer_reviews.text: within 10 days these balls looked worse than the ones they replaced. they covered with scuffs and nicks in the surfaces. looked great in the beginning but now are terrible. I would buy something a little more expensive next time and hope for better.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Great For Price
customer_reviews.text: Arrived right on time brand new in the box. Standard sized balls. Nice. Bright white cue, vibrant colors on pool balls along with bright white. Would compliment any billiard table. Like them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth itYou’re looking for something a little nicer
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the printing on the Ballz is not what I thought, it’s very blurry and the balls are yellow and give the appearance of being old....I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nick V.

customer_reviews.title: Great set of balls
customer_reviews.text: Great set of balls, great quality. We are using in a commercial setting on a coin op table. The cue ball that comes with the set does not work with our table. I will have to order a different cue ball specifically for coin op tables. We are however impressed with this beautiful set. The box it comes in is very nice. Would make an impressive gift.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: great product !
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this product, the delivery was prompt and the product was just as advertised. I would recommend you to all my associates.
customer_reviews.author: willie A. Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured. They come in a nice box for storage if you need. Has inserts for the balls to fit in nicely. Great purchase for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE
customer_reviews.text: We were nervous that they might not be so nice for the price but WOW! They're just wonderful, exactly like any other pool ball we've played with, a total steal. 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lindy Willson

customer_reviews.title: Great Balls!
customer_reviews.text: An economical set of of pool balls to replace our 30 year old set. They work - and they were a good price!
customer_reviews.author: pfalck

customer_reviews.title: Good item
customer_reviews.text: I don’t play pool so I’m not sure about that. I am using them in a memory garden for my boyfriend that loved pool. It was cheaper to buy these brand new then finding used ones.
customer_reviews.author: msamos

customer_reviews.title: Not good for commercial use
customer_reviews.text: Cue ball is same size as other balls. Not good for commercial table where coin slots are used and cue ball and playing balls go to separate areas of table.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Just what the doctor ordered?
customer_reviews.text: Three-year-old grandson lost the 14 ball. It was time to get a new set after having the old one for 20 years.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: There’s absolutely nothing wrong with these! They work and look great, no regrets with this purchase at all.
customer_reviews.author: PiscesQueen

customer_reviews.title: Great For What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: I needed these billiard balls for a game known as Carpet Ball (do a web search for "carpetball"). So far they've held up well.
customer_reviews.author: MacMan

customer_reviews.title: Great for what they are
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. I use these at home and just for fun - meaning that I doubt they are what you’d want for a serious game but for what I use them for they’re excellent.
customer_reviews.author: JesseNYC

customer_reviews.title: More Balls For My Buck
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps the ball quality is not consistent, because I experienced none of the chipping or signs of usage that other reviewers claim. My set was pristine, and after several years of semi-frequent use, there are still no obscene signs of use or wear on the balls, other than the obvious blue marks left by the chalk on the cue ball. These were clean, complete, and cheap - in summary, perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler P.

customer_reviews.title: Great balls for pool.
customer_reviews.text: Now I just need to buy a table and a cue. Maybe some chalk. Then I'll be set!
customer_reviews.author: Denver Mentalist

customer_reviews.title: MADE IN THE UNITED STATES 🇺🇸
customer_reviews.text: Made in the USA. Very high quality. Low price What could be better ?
customer_reviews.author: DeanJOH

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: They only occasionally go where I intend, but I can't blame the balls.
customer_reviews.author: BB & T

customer_reviews.title: Not very rugged
customer_reviews.text: They feel and look great however the 6 ball is already cracked and we've only used them a month.
customer_reviews.author: T. Dean

customer_reviews.title: Look great
customer_reviews.text: Look as good as my $250 set, good price and good bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Apeman Smith

customer_reviews.title: Pool is Cool
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to use in an art project.... needed a good price....
customer_reviews.author: JungleJim

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement balls
customer_reviews.text: Great pack of balls to replace some that had been lost.
customer_reviews.author: M. Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Great Pool ball set for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Our youth group had just built a carpet pool table and these pool balls were perfect to get the action going. Just what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Super good for price!
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of BALLS, vibrant coloring and dropped one on concrete with no breakage. Although que chalk stains them. Use white chalk maybe?
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Ehlinger

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price. Used on sportbar
customer_reviews.text: We bought them for a sport bar. For the price they are great. I cant complain. Though if you are looking for quality you should invest a little more and get a better material. They chip easily but that's somehow expected with the price you paid.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Villa Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Just as promised and hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: Using on our carpetball table. So far so good after a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: My dad was really excited when I purchased for him ...
customer_reviews.text: My dad was really excited when I purchased for him! He was missing 1 ball and this product was so inexpensive and came with a fast delivery!
customer_reviews.author: L Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Great for taking to the bar that has those less ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for taking to the bar that has those less than clean tables and where people often bounce them off the table. Because they're inexpensive your heart doesn't sink when you hear them hit the floor.
customer_reviews.author: KSF

customer_reviews.title: Nice Balls!
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying, I am not an avid pool player. I do however I own a pool table and was unhappy with the condition of the balls that came with it. ( I purchased my table used and the balls were old and dirty). This seems to have fixed my problem. The balls look/feel nice and seem to be perfectly round. The balls all seem to be a consistent weight. I have an old arcade table that sorts the Cue ball separate from the regular balls using a weighted mechanism. The balls all seem to go where they're supposed to
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I made a carpet ball game for my daughter and family for Christmas . They really enjoyed it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much Junk.
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money or time. These balls did not look like the pictures. They are cheap Empire balls that were nicked and scratched up after only a couple days of use. The balls also break dead.
customer_reviews.author: TXHollywood

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: For as much as we use these there not bad.nothing special but good for price
customer_reviews.author: j~me

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful pool set.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set of pool balls. Delivered just as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Willie Cochran Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Not what the picture shows
customer_reviews.text: They were good solid pool balls but the picture is misleading if your wanting really white pool balls these are not for you. I was disappointed to find that they were more of a cream color
customer_reviews.author: travis

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Pictures
customer_reviews.text: The color of these balls are atrocious. There is a faded gray/yellow mix on every ball. Not as the pictures show.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clean balls play much better.
customer_reviews.text: The clean surface of the balls actually make it easier to line up a shot. The old balls had scuff marks all over them. Your eye would focus on one of those instead of where you needed to hit it. Our games have improved as a result. Great decision to purchase them.
customer_reviews.author: PMKatus

customer_reviews.title: Billiard ball set
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the billiard ball set. Balls all play and roll as expected. Nothing out of the ordinary and nothing weird about them! Good choice! Price was good!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Williams

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: set came with two 10 balls and and two 12 balls. Not a full set of all the balls.
customer_reviews.author: Lionel T.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: It was as describe I don't say that often with amazon products.
customer_reviews.author: joyce

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Replacement for pool table. Could not tell the difference between the balls that was lost.
customer_reviews.author: Queen_Judah

customer_reviews.title: Not horrible, but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipment via Prime. Colors are NOT as vibrant as those in the photo and the numbers on the balls are blurry. Not horrible, but not perfect. These balls are clearly seconds, although for this price, I can't complain. Just want everyone to know before they make the decision to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff, some guy from NYC

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Super Fast Shipping
customer_reviews.text: The Billiard Ball Set was exactly as expected. The quality was great and the shipping was fast.
customer_reviews.author: Tanisha Griffin-gathright

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Balls are not white, they are all an old yellowish color, I might have been sent used balls.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Balls chip easily. Finish dull after several uses. Put my old set back to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. G in Plainfield, NJ

customer_reviews.title: Not crazy about the cue ball
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I wasn’t to crazy about is the fact that the cue ball stains...it has blue marks from the chalk all over it
customer_reviews.author: Dara Romero

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Brand new in the box, you don't expect imperfections? Scratched with an uneven surface.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Solid Pool Ball Set
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product and it arrived in mint condition - not used. It is a basic billiard ball set (no extra bells and whistles) and this is what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Best quality for price anywhere ....
customer_reviews.text: excellent value !!! was actually expecting cheaper quality balls for the price to replace my current ones at work but was surprised to see the font size of numbers were of a higher grade . Super Happy !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rbaz123

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect quality fully functional set of billiard balls. You get what you see.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Rotwang Dockendorf

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Have been using these for few months , very good product .i would recommend this to anyone .
customer_reviews.author: AMJAD SHAHID

customer_reviews.title: Amazing colors!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this purchase. Vibrant colors and well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Balls are cheap. Chipped during normal use. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Pool balls
customer_reviews.text: Great ball set wasn't for my coin drop table but made great gift for a pocket table
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only been using the balls for a few Months and they are beginning to chip from normal que ball impacts.
customer_reviews.author: G1422

customer_reviews.title: I needed a nice set for the adults to use when they came ...
customer_reviews.text: We have grandchildren who come over to play on the pool table and because of their age have misplaced some of the balls. I needed a nice set for the adults to use when they came to our house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried about the quality because of the price and few negative feedback, but the balls is in good quality, I don't find any differences from the balls you usually find in sports bars. Nothing fancy but I am a casual player, this is all I need.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for backyard pool table
customer_reviews.text: They’re not regulation size or weight but who’s playing tournaments great for a fun backyard pool table
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: they're in a fruit bowl on a table very cool convo piece
customer_reviews.author: jdub39

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. My pool table is not standard size but this set works great with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Solis

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not what i ordered. Big Amazon shopper and very disappointed. Received Empire balls instead of iszy as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: The price was just right didn’t have any dislikes very satisfied with the purchase!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Roger C.

customer_reviews.title: Very good. Just get a better white ball
customer_reviews.text: Very good balls. Have been using for a couple of months, they’re still very good.
customer_reviews.author: Luiz & Tai

customer_reviews.title: Price is unbelievable
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful balls for the price, actually any price. Recieved them in two days
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great pool balls!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these pool balls nothing wrong with them at all.. exactly as described and the very good price for this size
customer_reviews.author: Sengel

customer_reviews.title: White ball is same size
customer_reviews.text: The balls are great, should was fast. However the cue ball Murray be the same size as the other balls, because it doesn't come out of the right opening. Instead it goes down the same way as all of the other balls.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Silva

customer_reviews.title: Great balls
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be good enough - they are round and hard, just as they should be.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Chris

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice set, just disappointed the cue ball was not heavier than the others.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Great service and Product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent service form Empire. Design of balls is great! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Shanna Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Don't was your money on these.
customer_reviews.text: The balls were chipped. I didn't want to use them on my newly resurfaced pool table. I threw them away. This purchase was a waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn

customer_reviews.title: and neither are my shots so these work perfect for my friends and I
customer_reviews.text: These pool balls are not top of the line, and neither are my shots so these work perfect for my friends and I.
customer_reviews.author: Stu

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: A very nice set of billiard balls. Cost is about 25% lower than like items on the market. Wasn't sure what to expect but was plesently surprized when they arrived. Not the very best but...Look and play very nicely on my table. I would not hesitate to purchase another set, especially at this price. Great buy !
customer_reviews.author: Tinhorse34

customer_reviews.title: put the ball on bar tables they get drity fast ...
customer_reviews.text: put the ball on bar tables they get drity fast but i clean them weekly they have been playing ok

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set. Haven't banged them around yet but they look and feel great

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Billiard Ball Set!
customer_reviews.text: Much nicer and much cheaper than other options. I got these to replace a set at work that people use regularly. They are nice and smooth and shiny. They looks great and work well. There are many others on Amazon that cost significantly more, yet having seen some more expensive sets, there is not much of a difference (other than price).

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: these are very heavy balls. had to return them, also were somewhat discolored.
customer_reviews.author: Rlx

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: quite nice. perfect size for a standard table (non bar style). Quite happy.

customer_reviews.title: great product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Just as expected ... great product at a great price!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Balls chip easily but balls are shiny and bright colors

customer_reviews.title: Good and fun.
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered them for an art project but my friends wanted to replace their old billiard balls. Much excitement over this quality product.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, very happy with purchase. Price point is excellent.

customer_reviews.title: that the price was right
customer_reviews.text: they were perfect to replace the ones that I had

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Arrived much earlier than expected and was a perfect match for what we needed. Easy vendor to deal with, great explanation of the product online. Well packed when shipped.

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The only reason I'm not giving 5 stars were because I've only had them a few days... I'll update it a little later if I feel I should...

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! they look good and on my second break ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! they look good and on my second break i hit the 8 ball in! Never did that before
customer_reviews.author: FLGrillman

customer_reviews.title: Tested a few games
customer_reviews.text: I Played for a bit and the quality is superb it will last quite some time with normal wear and tear. No chips and great quality product.

customer_reviews.title: Ball set
customer_reviews.text: Good set of balls. Fast shipping, arrived in perfect condition in a nice little box. Happy with purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice, I used them for an ornament not to play.

customer_reviews.title: rack em up
customer_reviews.text: Work as stated and look much better than the yellowing balls they replaced.

product_meta.title: Pool Table Billiard Ball Set, Art Number Style
product_meta.description: 2 1/4" regulation size and weight - Made of polyester resin - 6 ounce balls - Art number style - Price shown is for full set of balls including cue ball - Set comes boxed
feature_bullets: Grade A deluxe quality - 2 1/4" regulation size and weight
Made of polyester resin - 6 ounce balls
Art number style - Price shown is for full set of balls including cue ball
